ailist.AIList¶

class ailist.AIList¶

Wrapper for C ailist_t

AIList stores a list of intervals

Attributes

first

Start of first interval in AIList

is_closed

‘bool’

is_constructed

‘bool’

is_frozen

‘bool’

is_sorted

‘bool’

last

End of last intervals in AIList

range

AIList.last - AIList.first

size

Number of intervals in AIList
